reviewText: This is one that my 7 year old likes to play again and again.  As I've said in my other reviews, Story Keepers are a huge it with my grandchildren, and I love them because each one has one or 2 stories that Jesus told--so the children come away with some good Bible knowledge.  I just wish they were still being produced!
My friends introduced us to this series and we have found it Biblical and fun. Yes they get exaggerated with their rescues but my kids enjoy it and watch them over and over and learn faithfulness.
